data: Empathy goes a long way in winning team support
Having a solution focused mindset and taking a win- win approach can help achieve positive results even with challenging stakeholders.
Choosing an approach that can positively add value to the brand and the overall reputation of the organization may require evaluating situations from a big picture perspective.
Decisions often have long term impacts that may have positive or negative consequences, it helps to keep both an immediate and a long-term view in mind while deciding a course of action.

Leaders often feel the pressure for making the right decision, the success of any decision depends if it has been taken with an open mind and if it balances all three business, and customer and people impact well.
